attributes.action: SUPPORT & THANK our NHS staff during this Covid 19 crisis.
attributes.additional_details: We ask the government ceases to pursue the privatisation of our NHS either in part or as a whole. In short we are asking the government to play fair by our NHS. To provide ppe, test kits and all necessary equipment immediately, to show financial thanks to NHS employees and to make a commitment to retaining and improving our NHS. This crisis has shown just how important a well funded, fully equipped NHS is to each and every one of us.
attributes.background:
We ask the government to immediately supply NHS staff with all necessary test kits, medical equipment & PPE needed. To give a tax free bonus to all NHS staff & a payrise to all staff involved in direct patient care.

In addition we say 'Hands off our NHS'. We DO NOT want our NHS privatised.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304243
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300019

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
